content: sl decrease turn note you will be crocheting into stitches from round 15 in this row row 18 skipping single_crochet sl decrease of previous row 1 sl in 1st single_crochet of previous row * 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease repeat from * 2 more times sl in next stitch turn row 19 skipping sl of previous row 1 sl in 1st single_crochet of previous row 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet sl in last single_crochet of previous row place stitch marker in this sl for use in round 20 turn round 20 skipping sl of previous row 1 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet of row 19 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in sl of row 19 3 single_crochet worked down side of row to round 15 1 single_crochet in each of next 6 single_crochet from round 15 3 single_crochet worked up side of row 1 single_crochet in marked sl of row 19 move stitch marker to the last worked single_crochet to mark end of round 20 17 single_crochet stuff body at this point round 21 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in each of next 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet 14 single_crochet begin carrying darker color again round 22 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in each of next 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 12 single_crochet © andrea moberly 2008 round 23-33 stuffing as you go use chart for rounds 23-33 as for rounds 5-15 remember to read chart from right to left note x decrease means 2 single_crochet decrease using darker color round 23 x x x x x x 12 single_crochet round 24 x decrease x x x x x 11 single_crochet round 25 x x decrease x x x x 10 single_crochet round 26 x x x x x x 10 single_crochet round 27 x x x x x 10 single_crochet round 28 x x x 10 single_crochet round 29 x x x x x 10 single_crochet round 30 x x x x x 10 single_crochet round 31 x x x x x x 10 single_crochet round 32 x x x x 10 single_crochet round 33 x 10 single_crochet round 34 using lighter color single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 single_crochet stop carrying darker color cut off leaving approx a 1 in tail round 35 repeat round 34 round 36 * 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * 4 more times 15 single_crochet finish off leaving long tail to sew on head head note this piece not worked in spiral each round will be joined by a sl into 1st stitch followed by a chain 1 to begin the next round to avoid a traveling seam work 1st single_crochet of each round in the same stitch in which you work your chain 1
